title: Advanced science: vacuum practice
brief_description: The concept of vacuum and the application of high vacuum techniques. The pressure of a gas; various types of vacuum pumps; instruments for measuring degrees of vacuum; high vacuum techniques as applied in electronics, manufactures, metallurgy, pharmacy, the electron microscope and the apparatus of nuclear research.
